title: Drishti-NE Dataset Strategy (MVP)

intendedDatasets.intendedUse: Open government datasets for disaster and geography

mvpDataApproach.description: MVP uses synthetic and demo data only. No live ingestion from external APIs or government sources.

ethicalConstraints.description: No personal data (PII) is collected, stored, or processed. User data is limited to role and session for access control.

futureProductionConsiderations: Formal data-sharing agreements with NDMA/IMD/state authorities before any ingestion
Anonymization and aggregation for any external datasets
Data retention and deletion policy aligned with DPDP Act
